basics.name: Logan Bowles
basics.label: Student, T1 Apple Advisor
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science at the University of North Carolina in Greensboro. I expect to graduate in December, 2025.

education.institution: University of North Carolina at Greensboro, Greensboro, NC

work.summary: Providing excellent customer support on a Software related basis for all Apple Products to some degree.
highlights: Work with dozens of Apple Customers daily and have strengthened dozens of customers bonds with Apple as a company.
Efficiently multitasking during every minute of every shift in a way to save the customer and the business time.
Receive and instantly implement training in the ever-evolving tech space that Apple conquers.

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
